content: make these happy birds in your favorite colors for decoration at christmas or anytime of the year or hang in baby s room or mobile you first crochet the body and fill it then make the tail and head **what you need** * small amounts of yarn in your chosen colors the yarn can be any weight but they need to all be about the same thickness i used sports weight 100% cotton the bird only weighs 8 grams 0 3oz * crochet hook that goes with your yarn clover amour size 3mm was used for the birds in the photos * small amount of stuffing * glitter yarn for the hanging loop * large needle and scissors this is a video pattern no written instructions
